sentence.Network_en: We try to preclude any possibility of misunderstanding.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们努力排除任何误解的可能性.

sentence.Network_en: He would rebuff enquiries in such a way as to preclude any further discussion.
sentence.Network_cn: 他会断然拒绝询问，使得无法进行进一步的讨论。

sentence.Network_en: My present finances preclude the possibility of buying a car.
sentence.Network_cn: 按我目前的财务状况我是不可能买车的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... inclusive a 包括在内的 preclude v 预防；杜绝 preclusion n 预防；排除.
10天背10000... ... ahead seem tube flooded 涌到 precluded 排除 white curtains hung at the little window to let in 让…进来.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... inclusive a 包括在内的 preclude v 预防；杜绝 preclusion n 预防；排除.

list.abs: 排除所有误解 preclude all misunderstanding  需求计划 demand schedule  与…竞争 in competition with  不完全竞争市场 imperfectly competitive market  与…配对.
we try to preclude any possibility of misunderstanding ., 我们力图消除任何误解的可能.
Their move does not preclude others from investing ., 他们这一行动并不影响其他人进行投资.
英语翻译... ... set beside the cushion 撤销职务或头衔, 免职 preclude misunderstanding 避免误解 prevent diseases 预防疾病。.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent. (in the sense 'bar (a route or passage)'): from Latin praecludere, from prae 'before' + claudere 'to shut'

entry.def: If something precludes an event or action, it prevents the event or action from happening.

example.ex: At 84, John feels his age precludes too much travel...
example.tran: 84岁的约翰感到自己年事已高，不能进行太多的旅行。

example.ex: He would rebuff enquiries in such a way as to preclude any further discussion.
example.tran: 他会断然拒绝询问，使得无法进行进一步的讨论。

entry.def: If something precludes you from doing something or going somewhere, it prevents you from doing it or going there.

example.ex: A constitutional amendment precludes any president from serving more than two terms...
example.tran: 一项宪法修正案使得任何总统的任职不得超过两届。

example.ex: In some cases poor English precluded them from ever finding a job.
example.tran: 英语不好有时会让他们找不到工作。

means.word_mean: 1. keep from happening or arising; have the effect of preventing;

sentences.sentence: "My sense of tact forbids an honest answer"

auth_sentence.content: To my mind, that would preclude any serious discussions.
auth_sentence.res_content: To my mind, that would preclude any serious discussions.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To my mind, that would preclude any serious discussions.

auth_sentence.content: But that does not preclude them hurting some particular groups.
auth_sentence.res_content: But that does not preclude them hurting some particular groups.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But that does not preclude them hurting some particular groups.

auth_sentence.content: Just might preclude the real end of anything.
auth_sentence.res_content: Just might preclude the real end of anything.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Just might preclude the real end of anything.

stems_affixes.word_buile: pre在……前的,预先+built建造的,build的过去式和过去分词→adj.预制的
pre在……前的,预先+car=care关心+ious……的→要预先关心的→冒险的
pre在……前的,预先+cise切→预先切好的→精确的
pre在……前的,预先+coc=coct煮+ious……的→提前煮熟→早熟的
pre在……前的,预先+school学校→上学前的
pre在……前的,预先+sci知道+ent表形容词→预先知道
pre在……前的,预先+amble跑→跑在前面→前言
pre在……前的,预先+caution小心→预先小心→预防
pre在……前的,预先+ced走+ent人或物等→走在前面的东西→先例
pre在……前的,预先+cept拿→以前拿好的[名言]→格言
pre在……前的,预先+cinct捆→预先捆好的→范围
pre在……前的,预先+cipice头→在前面是尽头→峭壁
pre在……前的,预先+cipit头→ation→落在前头→降落,下降
pre在……前的,预先+destination目的地→预先定好的目的地→命中注定
pre在……前的,预先+disposition性情→性情预定→癖性
pre在……前的,预先+fix固定→固定在前面→前缀
pre在……前的,预先+history历史→n.史前
pre在……前的,预先+occup占有+ation表名词→优先占有[注意力]→全神贯注
pre在……前的,预先+position位置→位置放在前面→前置词
pre在……前的,预先+rog要求+ative表名词→预先要求→[有]特权
pre在……前的,预先+ced走+e→走在前面→[时间上]先于
pre在……前的,预先+clud关闭+e→提前关闭→阻止
pre在……前的,预先+dict说→预先说→预言
pre在……前的,预先+fer带来→先带来→更喜欢
pre在……前的,预先+pay付钱→v.预付
conclude[[v.结论;终结]]男→adj.决定性的;结论性的
exclude[[v.排除,隔绝]]→adj.排外的, 孤高的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 排除, 除外, 被排除在外的事物
stems_affixes.word_buile: exclude[[v.排除,隔绝]]→n.排除, 除外, 被排除在外的事物
occlude[[v.闭塞,堵塞]]男稳荽省鷑.闭塞,堵塞
preclude[[v.妨碍;阻止]]→n.排除, 阻止
con全部+clud关闭+e→全部关掉→结束
ex出+clud关闭+e→关出去→排除
in进入+clude=clud关闭→关进去→包括
oc一再+clude=clud关闭→一再关起来不畅通→堵塞
pre预先,提前+clud关闭+e→提前关闭→阻止
se分开+clud关闭+e→分开关→隐居的

means.word_mean: 阻止; 排除; 妨碍; 使…行不通

sentences.en: We try to preclude any possibility of misunderstanding.
sentences.cn: 我们努力排除任何误解的可能性。

sentences.en: Abdication is precluded by the lack of a possible successor.
sentences.cn: 因为没有可能的继承人, 让位无法实现。

jushi.english: Abdication is precluded by the lack of a possible successor.
jushi.chinese: 因为没有可能的继承者,让位无法实现。

jushi.english: The adoption of one choice often precludes the use of another.
jushi.chinese: 选取了一种就常常不得使用另一种了。

jushi.english: The suicide note precluded the possibility of murder.
jushi.chinese: 那封绝命书排除了他杀的可能性。
